channel.title: Padzahr
channel.description: Padzahr is a social enterprise. We want to democratise data, giving communities, organisations and individuals a platform from which to make decisions and influence policy.

item.title: Padzahr's first visualisation is released!
item.description:
The current visualisation shows how much the University of Edinburgh invested in companies and funds in 2013. The data is from Whatdotheyknow.

List of companies that the University of Edinburgh is investing on in 2015 is almost the same as 2013. At the moment weâ€™re in the process of getting data about 2015.

Explore the data by going to Padzahr UoE Investments
